blogPost.excerpt: Plan the things you love to do with your friends both online and in person. Make plans with friends, share plans, see what others are up to, and keep track of upcoming events. Plan get-togethers, brunch, study sessions, your next date, you name it!
blogPost.body: Plan the things you love to do with your friends both online and in person. Make plans with friends, share plans, see what others are up to, and keep track of upcoming events. Plan get-togethers, brunch, study sessions, your next date, you name it!
blogPost.title: Planmesh - The easiest way to plan with friends
blogPost.author: Jose Togbe

localize.description: 计划您喜欢的事情，与您的朋友在线和亲自做。与朋友一起制定计划，分享计划，看看其他人在做什么，并跟踪即将到来的活动。计划聚餐、早午餐、学习课程、下一次约会，你说的都可以。
localize.tagline: 最简单的和朋友一起计划的方法

localize.description: 計劃您喜歡的事情，與您的朋友在線和親自做。與朋友一起制定計劃，分享計劃，看看其他人在做什麼，並跟蹤即將到來的活動。計劃聚餐、早午餐、學習課程、下一次約會，你說的都可以。
localize.tagline: 最簡單的和朋友一起計劃的方法

previous.excerpt: DuoQi is a 65W Gallium Nitride (GaN) charger which integrates a foldable 15W double-sided wireless charging pad, a USB-A 3.0 and a Type-C PD charging port.
previous.title: DuoQi - The 1st 65W GaN Charger w/ Wireless Charging Pad

localize.description: DuoQi是一款65W氮化镓(GaN)充电器，它集成了一个可折叠的15W双面无线充电板、一个USB-A 3.0和一个Type-C PD充电口。
localize.tagline: 第1个65W GaN无线充电板充电器

localize.description: DuoQi是一款65W氮化鎵(GaN)充電器，它集成了一個可摺疊的15W雙面無線充電板、一個USB-A 3.0和一個Type-C PD充電口。
localize.tagline: 第1個65W GaN無線充電板充電器

next.excerpt: Lendtable gives employees the cash to max out their full 401(k) match and employee stock purchase plan (ESPP). Sign up in 3 minutes to start earning thousands of dollars a year from your employee benefits.
next.title: Lendtable - We give you the money to max out your employee benefits

localize.description: Lendtable为员工提供现金，使他们的401(k)匹配计划和员工股票购买计划(ESPP)达到最大值。在3分钟内注册，开始从您的员工福利中每年赚取数千美元。
localize.tagline: 我们给你钱，让你的员工福利最大化

localize.description: Lendtable爲員工提供現金，使他們的401(k)匹配計劃和員工股票購買計劃(ESPP)達到最大值。在3分鐘內註冊，開始從您的員工福利中每年賺取數千美元。
localize.tagline: 我們給你錢，讓你的員工福利最大化
